data.name: Product Management in the '20s by fmr Apple Head of PM
data.summary:
Main takeaways:
- The fall of vanity metrics is coming
- Intentionally choosing values replaces being “neutral”
- Stakeholder analysis replaces personas
- Systems thinking replaces design thinking
- Shared context replaces being data-driven
data.speakers:
Sari Harrison



Sari is a Product Leader who is passionate about helping high tech organizations to deliver more humane technology. After more than 18 years working with product management, she is currently holding the position of Head of Product Outcomes at Center for Humane Technology.
